summary: Completed Phase 7 Memory/RAG testing covering backend RPC methods, frontend Memory panel, and integration features

partial_functionality.issue: Agent not using memory_search tool when requested in chat
partial_functionality.impact: Users cannot manually trigger memory search via agent

partial_functionality.issue: WebSocket connection timeouts during long agent conversations
partial_functionality.symptoms: Connection drops during memory auto-extraction process

working_features.status: Working correctly - manual memory storage with embeddings
Working correctly - semantic similarity search with scores
Working correctly - successfully cleared all memories
Fully functional with all UI elements working
Working - search input and button functional
Working - add form appears and accepts input
Working - displays stored memories with content preview

passed_tests: memory.store RPC stores memories with embeddings
memory.search RPC finds semantically similar memories
Frontend Memory panel displays and functions correctly
Memory search UI accepts input and processes searches
Manual memory addition form works properly
Memory count indicator shows correct numbers

action_item_for_main_agent.memory_search_tool: Investigate why agent is not using memory_search tool when explicitly requested in chat conversations
action_item_for_main_agent.websocket_timeouts: Review WebSocket connection handling during long agent turns to prevent timeouts during memory auto-extraction
action_item_for_main_agent.tools_count_verification: Verify that memory_search tool is properly registered and available to agents (should be 6 tools total)

success_percentage.backend_core_features: 80% (4/5 core RPC methods working, tool integration partially working)
success_percentage.frontend_ui: 100% (Memory panel fully functional with all UI elements)
success_percentage.overall_phase7: 85% (Core memory storage/search working, UI complete, minor tool integration issues)
